name: Amethyst Bud
description: Amethyst, bred by Soma Seeds, is a hybrid cross between Lavender and Afghani Hawaiian with a deep purple color.  Strong and pungent smell with a nice taste will provide you with a nice and relaxing high.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Happy, Relaxed, Focused, Energetic, Insomnia, Stress, Nausea, Pain, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Paranoid
